name: Farewell to the Universe
description:
God reflects on their long, long life on the last day of time before everything ceases to exist.

While bidding farewell to their close friend, they consider the question they were never able to answer; what is the meaning of existence?

FAREWELL TO THE UNIVERSE is a tiny (1k words) kinetic novel made for O2A2 (Only One of Any Asset) Game Jam.  Has no choices and one ending only.

Note; this story deals with death, religion, and existential themes that may be uncomfortable or distressing for some players. Please read at your own discretion.

- CREDITS -

- Music: An Evening, A Lifetime from Twin Musicom.

- Story, art, and programming by fyshku productions
